item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: mm_admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: mm_admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: mm_admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://sphynx.localtest.me:8081.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Available Kittens & Reservations
item.content:encoded:
Available Kittens & Reservations

We invite you to browse our available kittens ready to join loving families, along with upcoming stars you can reserve in advance. We complete spay or neuter procedures, vaccinations, socialization, and health certifications before any kitten travels home.

Current & Upcoming Companions

MM2025-01 Â· Wanda Jr.

Status: Available

Profile: We celebrate Wanda Jr. as a gentle, affectionate cuddle-seeker with luminous white skin and crystalline blue eyes.

Age: 4 months Â· Price: $4,500

Pedigree: Daughter of CFA RW Best Sphynx Wanda and champion sire Dada, blending grace, balance, and serenity.

MM2025-02 Â· Loki Jr.

Status: Available

Profile: We adore Loki Jr. for a curious, playful, and clever personality that explores every room by our side.

Age: 3.5 months Â· Price: $3,800

Pedigree: Descendant of multi-champion Sphynx lines celebrated for sparkling temperament and athletic type.

MM2025-03 Â· Gogoda

Status: Reserved

Profile: We nicknamed Gogoda our runway muse â outgoing, camera-ready, and eager to entertain with energetic play.

Age: 5 months Â· Price: $5,200

Pedigree: Extended champion lineage with exceptional head shape and stage presence.

MM2025-04 Â· Aurora

Status: Upcoming

Profile: We watch Aurora blossom into a calm, observant seal point beauty who prefers gentle laps and warm blankets.

Age: 2 months (upcoming) Â· Price: TBA

Pedigree: Reserved from a pairing focused on soft expression, robust health, and soulful eye color.

Begin Your Adoption Journey

We guide you through an artful and transparent adoption experience. Submit an application to join our guardianship circle, and we will schedule a personal consultation to ensure the perfect match for your lifestyle.

Apply for Adoption

item.title: Our Cats
item.content:encoded:
The Miss Mermaid Ensemble

Each resident is a CFA-celebrated personality with an individual wardrobe, enrichment schedule, and guardian mentor. Dive deeper into their stories, then follow the links to our About atelier and the curated Gallery.

GC Miss Mermaid Wonderwave âWandaâ

Temperament: Velvet diplomat who melts into shoulders; leads newcomer socialisation.

Color: Blue-cream mink with opalescent undertones.

Lineage: Descendant of European Grand Champions with proven HCM-negative heritage. Wanda anchors our selective pairing program described on the Adoption page.

  • Signature Achievement: Triple-ring sweep at the Cascadia Feline Invitational with perfect grooming scores.
  • Favourite Enrichment: Weighted cuddle wrap paired with lavender-infused diffuser sessions.
  • Concierge Tip: Schedule evening bonding inspired by the rhythm we outline in the Care Guide.

RW QGC Miss Mermaid Luminous âYodaâ

Temperament: Mindful observer who chirps softly during grooming demos.

Color: Seal point with shimmering warmth.

Lineage: Blends Canadian show lines with a Mediterranean muse. Yodaâs mindfulness cues inform the routines shared on the Care Guide.

Signature Rituals: Sunrise stretch choreography, mindful breathing beside salt lamps, and guided cuddle meditations that we teach during step two of the Adoption journey.

CH Miss Mermaid Daring Muse âDadaâ

Temperament: Playful provocateur who thrives on interactive puzzles.

Color: Red tabby with bronze undertones.

Lineage: Bold fusion of avant-garde Eastern European studs. Dada inspires enrichment modules featured in our FAQ insights.

  • Creative Playlists: Rotating jazz and synthwave sessions keep Dadaâs curiosity engaged.
  • Training Notes: Clicker cues and scent trails form the backbone of our puzzle rotations.
  • Guardian Homework: Mirror Dadaâs daily obstacle course using instructions in the Care Guide.

CH Miss Mermaid Golden Echo âGogodaâ

Temperament: Gentle storyteller who curls around wrists during quiet evenings.

Color: Cream and white bicolor with porcelain glow.

Lineage: Harmonises Scandinavian warmth with North American vigor. Gogodaâs alumni families share updates within the Testimonials studio.

Wardrobe Capsule: Gogoda favours cashmere capes, merino bodysuits, and reversible travel wraps. We share fit guides and care instructions during concierge consultations.

House Rituals & Guardian Pathways

Our ensemble thrives on predictability paired with creative enrichment. Guardians receive weekly rehearsal notes covering hydration, climate adjustments, and socialisation prompts. Use these alongside the Care Guide to create a nurturing environment that mirrors our studio.

  • Monday: Aroma therapy check-in followed by tactile play led by Wanda.
  • Wednesday: Interactive puzzle circuits inspired by Dadaâs favourite obstacle course.
  • Friday: Velvet lounge storytelling with Gogoda, paired with mindfulness stretches from Yoda.

Families considering adoption can observe these rituals during virtual tours and replicate the cadence at home prior to kitten arrival. The deeper your alignment with our rhythm, the smoother your transition into lifelong guardianship.

Every Miss Mermaid resident mentors the next generation through cuddle rehearsals, sound conditioning, and car-ride simulations. Arrange a private introduction via the Contact suite and preview adoption steps on the Adoption page.

item.title: About Miss Mermaid
item.content:encoded:
About Miss Mermaid

We founded Miss Mermaid on the belief that true breeding is where love, art, and genetics meet. We produce visually arresting, emotionally intuitive, and remarkably healthy Sphynx companions.

Our Philosophy

Transparent care, ethical decisionâmaking, and unwavering wellbeing. Screenings, enrichment, and thoughtful placement elevate every experience for guardian and kitten.

Our Bloodlines

We steward the legacy of CFA luminaries with meticulous pedigrees, HCMânegative lines, and independent health testing for structure, personality, and longevity.

Life at Miss Mermaid

Freeâroam family life, daily play, guest interactions, and immaculate grooming keep skins luminous, eyes bright, and characters secure.

Our Mission

Elevate the global perception of the Sphynx breed through responsible breeding, transparent education, and artistry of care.

item.title: Adoption
item.content:encoded:
Adoption with Heart

Our guardianship journey is paced so your household feels ready, resourced, and supported. We remain beside you from initial inquiry through lifelong alumni salons.

1. Curated Application

Share your home rhythm, travel cadence, and existing companions. We review your narrative alongside resources in the Care Guide to tailor recommendations.

2. Alignment Conversation

Meet our guardianship concierge via video tour. We showcase nursery zones, introduce Wanda or Yoda, and align expectations on grooming, nutrition, and budget.

3. Reservation Harmony

Once aligned, reserve your kitten with a signed guardianship charter. You receive weekly updates, scent swatches, and enrichment assignments.

4. Environment Rehearsal

We coach you on temperature zoning, skincare rituals, and emergency prep using templates from the FAQ archive and Care Guide.

5. Homecoming & Alumni Care

Your kitten travels with a couture wardrobe, nutrition plan, and veterinary dossier. Post-arrival, we schedule check-ins at one week, one month, and three months, plus invite you to share updates on the Testimonials lounge.

Adoption Investment

Investment begins at $3,800 USD, inclusive of HCM scanning, microchipping, baseline labs, spay/neuter, couture wardrobe, and lifetime concierge access. Families gain entry to alumni webinars covering bathing choreography, meal prepping, and seasonal wellness.

What to prepare before you apply: review bathing tools in the Care Guide, confirm local exotic veterinarians, and decide which resident (Wanda, Yoda, Dada, Gogoda) resonates. Our team loves matching energies.

Support Timeline & Guardian Touchpoints

From the moment your inquiry lands, our concierge documents every preferenceâambient music, wardrobe styles, travel plansâand folds them into a personalised guardianship roadmap. Use this overview alongside the Care Guide to pace your household preparations.

  • Week 0: Application review, lifestyle alignment call, and curated reading list.
  • Week 2: Nursery livestream, temperature audit checklist, and grooming kit recommendations.
  • Week 4: Reservation confirmation, scent exchange, and virtual rehearsal featuring Wanda or Yoda.
  • Week 6: Homecoming logistics, travel carriers, and emergency contact protocols.
  • Post-arrival: Scheduled check-ins at days 7, 30, and 90 plus alumni salon invitation.

These milestones stay flexible; families can request additional sessions focused on nutrition, multi-pet introductions, or international travel. We map each appointment using Rank Math notes so nothing is missed.

Guardian Resources to Bookmark

  • FAQ Library â quick replies for grooming tools, travel paperwork, and emergency planning.
  • Testimonials Lounge â listen to alumni advice on setting emotional expectations.
  • Contact Concierge â request bespoke kits, bilingual support, or post-adoption mentorship.

Ready to Apply?

Complete the Adoption Inquiry form below. Expect a personal response within 48 hours. Curious minds can preview recurring questions inside the FAQ library.

[fluentform id="3"]

item.title: FAQ
item.content:encoded:
Frequently Asked Questions

Are Sphynx cats hypoallergenic?

Less dander than coated breeds, but not fully hypoallergenic. Regular bathing and sheet changes help.

Do Sphynx get cold easily?

They crave warmth at rest; layer clothing and keep cozy beds.

How often to bathe?

About once a week or as needed; rinse thoroughly and moisturize.

item.title: Care Guide
item.content:encoded:
The Miss Mermaid Sphynx Care Codex

A living manuscript designed for guardians who view their Sphynx companions as living art. Bookmark this resource and revisit before each seasonâs shift. For personalised guidance, speak with our team via the Contact portal or schedule an adoption consultation on the Adoption page.

Skin & Bathing Rituals

The Sphynx coat reveals every nuance of wellbeing. We frame bathing as a spa experience staged once per week. Begin by warming the bathroom to 78Â°F (25.5Â°C) and playing a familiar soundtrack. Pre-bathing, use hypoallergenic wipes to loosen oils in skin folds. Apply a gentle, fragrance-free cleanser diluted with warm water. Cradle your companion so the heart rests against your forearm; this lowers adrenaline and keeps their breathing steady. Rinse thoroughly, ensuring no residue hides behind ears or between toes. Follow with a microfiber towel wrap and a warm, low-flow blow dry. Finish the ritual with a botanical moisturiser approved by your vet to maintain the lipid barrier. Rotate exfoliating gloves every month to avoid microabrasions. For travel or show weeks, use dry-bath foams and soothing mitts to maintain glow.

Nail care integrates into the bathing sequence. Clip claws every ten days while offering lickable treats. Clean ear canals with vet-approved drops and cotton pads; never insert swabs. For paw pad conditioning, apply calendula balm before bedtime and let your Sphynx walk across a warm towel to absorb the product. These rituals support the grooming philosophies we demonstrate during adoption step two.

Sunlight deserves special attention. While natural light enhances mood, prolonged direct exposure can lead to sunburn. We recommend UV-filtering window films and sun-protective apparel tailored to your companionâs measurements. During summer, schedule enrichment activities around dawn or twilight. In winter, complement limited sunlight with full-spectrum lamps positioned at least three feet above resting zones.

Nutrition Architecture

Sphynx metabolism is a roaring furnace. Provide four to five micro-meals daily, balancing high-protein raw or gently cooked meals with moisture-rich broths. Our culinary blueprint pairs 65% muscle meat, 20% organs, 10% bone, and 5% botanicals rich in antioxidants. Rotate proteinsâturkey, rabbit, quail, and responsibly sourced fishâto diversify amino acid profiles. Supplement with taurine, omega-3 DHA, and vitamin E under veterinary guidance. Hydration is key: install multiple water features, from ripple fountains to shallow ceramic dishes warmed slightly to mimic fresh prey temperature.

For kibble supplementation, select grain-free, high-meat recipes free from rendered by-products. Store in airtight containers away from sunlight to protect nutrients. Once weekly, offer goat milk kefir or bone broth for gut health. Monitor body condition using rib palpation and energy observation. If weight fluctuates, consult our nutritionist through the Contact desk. Senior companions may benefit from joint-support supplements and softer textures; kittens thrive on calorie-dense formulas aligned with our adoption dossiers.

Temperature & Environment

A Sphynx thrives between 72Â°F and 80Â°F (22-27Â°C). Invest in smart thermostats, thermal mats, and layered bedding to maintain warmth. Zone your home: create basking corners near windows with draft guards, establish play arenas with soft foam flooring, and build quiet lounges with weighted blankets. Rotate knitwear to prevent skin fatigueâlightweight bamboo blends for day, plush fleece for stargazing nights.

Humidity affects comfort. Maintain 45-55% relative humidity to balance skin hydration without encouraging mildew. Use essential oil diffusers cautiously; many oils are unsafe for cats. Instead, rely on gentle humidifiers paired with frequent cleaning. During warmer months, offer cooling tiles and chilled ceramic bowls. In cooler months, pre-warm carriers and car seats before travel. Positive reinforcementâtreat trails and gentle affirmationsâhelps companions associate temperature adjustments with celebration.

Environmental enrichment prevents boredom. Introduce climbing sculptures, puzzle feeders, and scent discovery baskets rotated weekly. Encourage vertical exploration with cat-safe shelving and hammocks. Pair enrichment with the interactive cues described on the Our Cats showcase, where each resident models favourite games.

Health & HCM Awareness

Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) screening forms the backbone of our breeding program. We perform baseline echocardiograms at 12 months, repeat them annually, and share results with families. Guardians should schedule follow-up scans every 18-24 months or upon veterinary recommendation. Observe for subtle changes: altered breathing cadence, reduced play endurance, or digestive shifts. Promptly consult your cardiologist if anything feels unusual.

Routine wellness includes quarterly exams during the first year post-adoption, transitioning to biannual visits for adults. Vaccinate according to your vetâs risk assessment, with particular attention to upper respiratory protection. Dental care is non-negotiable: implement daily tooth brushing with enzymatic toothpaste and schedule prophylactic cleanings. Microchip registration should be updated annually, especially before travel.

Mental wellbeing mirrors physical health. Watch for signs of anxietyâovergrooming, excessive vocalisation, or hiding. Create predictable rituals, offer companion cards carrying your scent, and integrate play that mirrors natural hunting cycles. If stress surfaces, revisit the soothing techniques detailed in our FAQ and connect with the guardianship team through the Adoption pathway for tailored support.

Seasonal Checklist & Ritual Planning

Seasonal shifts influence humidity, daylight, and mood. Prepare a quarterly checklist that aligns with your regional climate. Begin each season by auditing thermostat schedules, verifying garment fit, and refreshing enrichment toys. Rotate knitwear palettesâlinen blends for spring, breathable bamboo for summer, plush fleece for winterâand store them in breathable garment bags to preserve texture.

  • Spring: Introduce allergy protocols, deep-clean humidifiers, and schedule dermatology consults.
  • Summer: Increase hydration stations, add cooling tiles, and apply vet-approved sun protection.
  • Autumn: Transition to hearty broths, recalibrate heating pads, and rehearse travel carriers ahead of holiday visits.
  • Winter: Layer bedding, monitor humidity nightly, and book cardiology check-ins if travel is planned.

Document each adjustment in a shared family planner. This visibility keeps household members aligned and gives pet sitters clarity when you are away. We provide editable templates during concierge calls; request them via the Contact portal.

Travel & Integration Protocols

Introduce carriers as safe havens weeks before any trip. Leave the carrier open with warmed blankets and scatter treats inside. Practice short rides combined with positive reinforcement so your Sphynx associates travel with comfort. When flying, request cabin placement and carry a vet-certified acclimation letter. Store emergency contact cards in your travel wallet and in the carrier pocket.

For homes with other pets, stage scent exchanges using blankets and slow introductions through baby gates. Maintain separate feeding zones during the first fortnight. Observe body language closelyârelaxed ears, steady breathing, and gentle vocalisations signal progress. Consult the FAQ for troubleshooting or book a behaviourist session through our concierge.

The Miss Mermaid Care Codex evolves with every alumni insight. Share your discoveries in the Testimonials studio and inspire future guardians to elevate daily life for their velvety muses.
item.excerpt:encoded: Skin, nutrition, temperature, and health rituals for luminous Sphynx companionship.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Master Sphynx skincare, nutrition, temperature, and HCM awareness with Miss Mermaid's comprehensive guardianship codex.

item.title: Testimonials
item.content:encoded:
Stories from Our Velvet Alumni

Every tale reflects the adoption choreography described on the Adoption page and the daily rituals mastered through our Care Guide.

The Atelier Loft Â· Wanda x Elise

Elise, a textile artist, says Wandaâs presence transformed her studio: âShe perches on the loom bench, eyes half-closed, listening to jazz as if critiquing every warp and woof. The Miss Mermaid team coached me on humidifying the space without damaging fabric, and Wanda rewards us with twilight cuddle critiques.â

Elise adds that the concierge follow-ups helped her integrate seasonal nutrition tweaks and align Wandaâs skincare schedule with photoshoot demands. âTheir notes bridged the gap between artistic intuition and clinical expertise,â she explains.

The Skyline Home Â· Yoda x Amir & Devon

Amir and Devon live in a high-rise overlooking the bay. âYoda wakes us for sunrise yoga, stretching with perfect form. The concierge teamâs travel kit made cabin flights effortless. We now mentor new guardians by sharing our routines in the alumni salon.â

They host quarterly virtual gatherings where alumni exchange playlists, thermal layering tips, and enrichment ideas inspired by Yodaâs mindfulness sessions. âThe community feels like a design collective dedicated to feline wellbeing,â Amir notes.

The Garden Estate Â· Dada & Gogoda x Tran Family

The Tran family adopted bonded duo Dada and Gogoda. âThey sprint through our botanical greenhouse and collapse beneath the radiant floor heating. Miss Mermaidâs nutrition counsel keeps their energy balanced, and the gallery portrait session captured their sibling choreography beautifully.â

Their children helped craft enrichment mazes modelled after the Our Cats profiles. âMiss Mermaid encouraged us to document successes and speed bumps so future families can iterate faster,â the family shares.

Alumni Concierge Circle

Graduates receive quarterly salons hosted by our guardianship team. Sessions cover seasonal nutrition tweaks, artistry collaborations, and philanthropic partnerships supporting feline cardiology research. Members also access a private resource library with grooming tutorials, travel templates, and curated playlists.

  • Monthly Office Hours: Submit questions ahead of time and receive personalised video replies.
  • Resource Drops: Downloadable checklists and enrichment guides aligned with the Care Guide.
  • Spotlight Opportunities: Feature in our Gallery refresh or collaborate on artist residencies.

If you would like to join the circle, indicate your interest within the story form or message the concierge directly via the Contact page.

Submit Your Story

Ready to share your Sphynx muse? Complete the story form so we can celebrate your companion in the Gallery and inspire future guardians visiting the About studio.

item.title: Care Guide & FAQ
item.content:encoded:
Signature Care Guides

Bathing & Skin Care

Gentle weekly bath; avoid harsh shampoos; moisturize; clean ears and nails.

Nutrition & Health

Highâquality protein and hydration; regular vet visits; annual HCM screenings.

Temperature & Comfort

Warm spots, heated pads on low, breathable covers, sunâsafe sweaters.

item.title: Gogoda â MM2025-03
item.content:encoded: We present Gogoda as our outgoing show prospect, a photogenic spirit who thrives under spotlight handling and adores interactive play sessions. We have refined his routine for balanced muscle tone and effortless presentation.

item.title: Aurora â MM2025-04
item.content:encoded: We are nurturing Aurora as a gentle, observant seal point princess who prefers quiet lap time and warm blankets. We expect her to bloom into an elegant companion for a guardian who values calm connection.

item.title: Adoption Policies
item.content:encoded:
Adoption Policies

Transparent policies keep every guardian informed before deposits, during selection, and all the way through travel day.

Adoption & Deposit

Deposit $1000 secures priority. If no match, deposit rolls to next litter. Health contingency rules apply.

Payment Methods

Zelle preferred; PayPal Friends & Family. Upload proof within 24h.

Transport

LA area delivery free within 2 hours. Flyâin pickup supported. No cargo for Sphynx.
